website_summaries.verdict: In addition to its agreeable flavor, this maca powder also earns praise for its easy digestibility.
pros: Gets high marks for its flavor
Easily mixes into coffee or smoothies with no digestive side effects
cons: Comes in a poor quality container/bag that is difficult to close
Powder can be a bit clumpy

customer_reviews.title: Take it regularly for best
customer_reviews.text: This regulates your hormones ladies, we all need that. I take it every night 1/2 teaspoon in my sleepytime tea. Take it regularly for best results
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent super food.
customer_reviews.text: Organic Maca powder, it's an excellent energizing product. For breakfast I usually mix 1 or 2 tablespoons of Maca with 5 tablespoons of oatmeal, and add some water and boil, when it's ready I put some fresh fruits and honey. I'm a nurse and this breakfast give a lot of energy for my 12 hours shifts. I learned to eat Maca when I went on a trip to Peru, and for breakfast usually people there had Maca or quinua drinks. I highly recommend this product is a super food.
customer_reviews.author: Alegria

customer_reviews.title: I feel good adding to my fruit smoothies every morning
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the product. I feel good adding to my fruit smoothies every morning. I am 51, on no medication and my doctor says whatever you’re doing keep doing it. So I will continue to use maca powder along with other powders. I did have problem closing the bag with the built in ziploc but I just use my bag clip and all is good. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: of maca powder - and I don't even taste the maca powder (which is good because its bitter alone)
customer_reviews.text: I throw this in with my protein smoothie - 2 cups of protein powder, 1 scoop of naked PB, 1 banana, and 1 tbsp. of maca powder - and I don't even taste the maca powder (which is good because its bitter alone). I do notice more energy overall. I believe the price is competitive to other brands. Will definitely be a repeat buyer..
customer_reviews.author: T. Onat

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: On my second bag now and I love this stuff! Helps balance my hot flashes some! And if you put it in Greek yogurt.. will have super results with them. Plus.. it tastes good to, in the yogurt.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: They don’t skimp on quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I’ve been making my health smoothies at home lately and wanted to find some good protein to add into my smoothies. I choose this and flax and chi seeds and I’m happy I did! They taste great and although this running around mommy doesn’t seem too energized! Ha it does give me boost and I enjoy my healthy drinks! I will always order this stuff! I also can’t wait to try this banana pancakes your company emailed me! Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: My experience was different
customer_reviews.text: Im a female 37 years old who suffer from pms and stress and anxiety i heard alot about maca that it balance the hormones so i decide to try it. So i been having a tea spoon a day with my smoothie every morning after only 48 hours my anger and stress get worse and worse i didnt feel good at all so i had to stop it .
customer_reviews.author: issam b.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed yet
customer_reviews.text: My first try with Maca, and Feel Good Organics: Clumpy( is it fresh?), resealable bag won't reseal, tastes much like ginger - too much is really hot and uncomfortable tummy. Does not mix well by shaking - maybe a blender would work better, unmixed clumps are nasty!!! Not noticed anything out of the ordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kresek

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this and not really sure if it is working. I’m 68 , so how much energy could I have without giving myself stroke. A tiny bit of energy would be an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie J. Hepburn

customer_reviews.title: the maca powder
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is useful and good but I'm still trying to find ways that I can find useful for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: W. G. Stamper

customer_reviews.title: tasty
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I add it to my baked goods in place of gf flours. It adds a nice complexity to my chocolate chip cookies and other baked goods. I've also added it to smoothies, but usually just to cookies or brownies, bars.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but hate the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is delicious in my morning smoothies. I rated it 4 stars since the packaging was horrible, at least for me. My seal will not close. I had to transfer the product to a separate container. It was extremely messy. I definitely lost some product because of this. I will purchase again because I do like through taste and the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Maca Power
customer_reviews.text: I use Organic Maca Powder about 4 to 5 times a week. I add it to my fresh juice in the mornings. It was an acquired taste for me in the beginning. Now, my juice doesn't taste right without it. I strongly believe in the many benefits of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Clown

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but product has clumps
customer_reviews.text: If you blend it, it's great and has great flavor. I personally cannot use it as is. You can't just add it to a beverage plain. You'd have to blend it or crush the clumps someway. The clumps don't totally dissolve even using my electric frother. I usually mix it with ground flax and sprinkle over my oats and it's not fun biting into the clumps. Even with milk they don't dissolve or break down.
customer_reviews.author: KevsVeganGal

customer_reviews.title: Saved money over the capsules!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking maca for years in the capsule form. Decided to give this a try, no regrets! Will buy again. I put a half teaspoon in about a 1/4 cup of water and let sit for about 10 minutes. The powder stirs up nice after sitting in water for a bit. Tastes fine. Give it a try and save some money!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: best quality Maca
customer_reviews.text: Powder is great to add on smoothies for energy. Flavor is intense, too. Little is all needed for good flavor. My favorite is in a ice cubes and mixed fruits protein smoothie with Maca powder.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Knight

customer_reviews.title: So Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo delicious! Don't listen to people that say it tastes bad. They just don't know how to use it properly. Find a Maca smoothie recipe online and you'll be just fine. I've been using it solely in smoothies and it's been so great. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: what to say...
customer_reviews.text: we are happy with the purchase, easy to use and keep. doesnt take great but not bad either but we put it in our smoothies and dont even taste it at all
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L. Sabartinelli

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Omg ew hahah I added this to a smoothly and the flavor is not for me. I will have to try it in baked goods or some of the recipes off the site it’s a giant bag I have no clue how I’ll use it all.
customer_reviews.author: Corey McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: Great taste in smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Great product and I love that it is packaged more environmentally friendly than other Maca powder I bought
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Inactive
customer_reviews.text: Felt no effects. Tried a regular dose, 2x, 3x and 4x. I feel the effects of other Maca powders [like from Whole Foods] within 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Bronstein

customer_reviews.title: Maca Powder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this organic powder after reading a review on WebMD of the benefits maca powder has. WebMD touts the benefits of the powder in increasing iron and iodine and helping relieve anxiety and depression.
customer_reviews.author: rbt55

customer_reviews.title: Choose another brand, this product was a waste for me.
customer_reviews.text: This powder is a full yellow green, not like the dark green traditional Maca I was expecting. It is very difficult to mix and doesn't dissolve in water hot or cold. Very disappointed, choose another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Swtnnj

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting powder. I add it to my shakes in the morning (whether it be smoothie or shaken up powder shake) I have been using it for a couple weeks now (along with Moringa and Camu Camu) and I do feel good. I have several “Feel Good” items and they always seem to have quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Love Amzn

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I have only been adding this product for about two weeks. I am not sure exactly how I am supposed to feel, to be honest. However, I have had no adverse effect to it. It blends well with my daily morning smoothies. It is tasteless and I mix with veggies, fruits and coco water. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Romero

customer_reviews.title: it tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: It's not only healthy, but the taste is yummy too. I love it with oatmeal and milkshakes.
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This product may not garnish a good taste but it positively works to give me energy and is blandish to me. I use it with Moringa.
customer_reviews.author: Dutz

customer_reviews.title: Gave Me A Migraine
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this based upon reviews. But it gave me a bad migraine. And it is non-returnable. I will stay with their Matcha tea from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kelela

customer_reviews.title: Bag reseals for length of product.
customer_reviews.text: This product's quality is at least equal to other products I've tried and the "resealable" bag actually works for the duration of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Russell K.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for insomnia abd hot flashes from menopause
customer_reviews.text: OMG get some if this stuff! Had hot flashes so bad and was not sleeping at all. I sleep through the night now and only get an "occasional" hot flash and even then they are mild. The taste is fine, kind of nutty. I put it in my oatmeal or a shake Took about a week to kick in
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: broken seal
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with the seal loose and the powder all over the box. It also felt damp.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Really like.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this. Only the second one I have tried but it is the same as the other brand. So far so good! Will order this one again.
customer_reviews.author: ktmb

customer_reviews.title: Much better than iherb product I ordered before
customer_reviews.text: Much better than iherb product I ordered before. I love it. But, the container is weak. It didn't leak anything, but I couldn't use it, so moved powder tp glass-lock container instead. Considering price, I guess that was tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little clumpier than I expected, but it’s my first time trying Maca Powder. It has a good taste, though and all you have to do is mash it up a little or sift it to get the clumps out.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Great for banana smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I add this maca powder to my banana-vanilla protein powder-almond mild-ice smoothie. It blends in well and the yeasty taste of the powder is barely noticeable anymore. I'll definitely get more.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Blaette

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Source of rear vitamins and minerals, and from the best place - high in Peru mountains!
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in shakes!
customer_reviews.text: Put it in my protein Shake for women's health. Blends great and my nutritionist says it's good for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Over rated. Good brand, just not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Jan McQuistan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered...
customer_reviews.text: The powder arrived just as expected. The bag takes a bit of getting used to, but the product is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Meihuamom

customer_reviews.title: Great powder!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality powder and I like the package because it reseals easily. Would definitely recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: GreenLady

customer_reviews.title: Daily Ritual!
customer_reviews.text: I take Maca almost everyday due to the health benefits and sustainable energy it provides. It's very activating with a great taste! I add it to my cacao shakes and In cereal sometimes. This is a quality brand and will purchase again. Maca is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Demian Deas

customer_reviews.title: Love this superfood!
customer_reviews.text: I love this super food!!!! I add it to my coffee or smoothies, to my coffee it gives it a nutty taste, I keep stirring as I drink so it doesn't settle on bottom, love the taste and the energy I have throughout the day!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Package was open. Spilled everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Package came slightly open so the box was filled with powder. Not apart of return policy so I have to order another one. Will try different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is just what I needed for my smoothies. Gives me energy throughout the day and I feel healthier. Will definitely order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: maca is useful for a lot of things, including mood, hormone balancing, anxiety, stress and energy, things i'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lin For

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Nutty flavor. Use it when I juice or in my yogurt. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Tasty addition to your daily smoothie
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Organic Maca Powder in my vegan smoothies. It is added tasty nutrition to every drink. I mixed Organic Maca powder with blueberries, kale, baby spinach, and watermelon for a refreshing purple smoothie. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Helps with energy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Maca powder regularly for about a week now. Maybe it’s in my head; but, I feel like I have more energy and my skin on my face feels a bit more moisturized. The taste is pure disgusting and I don’t care for it, so I make sure to blend well in a morning smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Good packaging and good flavor. Just wish it was a bigger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil H.

customer_reviews.title: High quality Maca
customer_reviews.text: I love Maca’s nutritional properties and this brand is very high quality. Good price. Would totally buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Timely Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product earlier than I expected, which was nice. It's my first time trying Maca powder, and it does have a little bit of a distinct taste to it. It's not bad, but I've found it tastes best in berry-based smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The powder came in very good packaging...I will buy again...:)
customer_reviews.author: Renee Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Really good. Just a bit clumpy.
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is really good. Just a bit clumpy in the package, so wish it was a smoother powder, I suppose. But overall, pretty good Maca for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to mix and it doesn't have much taste.
customer_reviews.author: Shri

customer_reviews.title: Maca powder does it for me!
customer_reviews.text: Felt more energetic and slept much better after 2 days. Late afternoon I still feel like the Energizer bunny. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Patcat

customer_reviews.title: I do feel alot better when I get up in the morning
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok, I haven't been taking it along enough to see a big change. I do feel alot better when I get up in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Maca slightly nutty sweet flavor. I add to my smoothies or add ...
customer_reviews.text: Fresh Maca slightly nutty sweet flavor. I add to my smoothies or add Maca to yogurt with just a little bit of honey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hormonal balance, and energy I need.
customer_reviews.text: Like the benefits from Maca stamina, feel good energy! And for my hormonal balance👍
customer_reviews.author: Yogiflower

customer_reviews.title: 2nd bag has clumps in it
customer_reviews.text: The first bag I ordered was great, but this 2nd bag has clumps in it that I am unable to break up. Unable to return, which is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer234

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to the benefits
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had enough time to give full on review, but so far so good. I do like the benefits of what the Maca powder can do so that is mainly why I bought it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Reyes Locker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent whole food that gives energy and supports thyroid and immune system. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Soaring Spirit

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: Comes exactly how described. I actually love the smell of it. It smells like graham cracker crust to me. Tastes ok in my tea but its best with yogurt or granola w/milk. Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: JGmomof4

customer_reviews.title: Great Maca powder.
customer_reviews.text: Now if it were available for purchase again! Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Health foods and organic OS a plus
customer_reviews.text: It's a bitter but it does come from the radish family. Giving it a try for health reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Esveidi Uroza

customer_reviews.title: Maca is new to me, I've been putting it ...
customer_reviews.text: Maca is new to me, I've been putting it in all sorts of different things for an extra nutritional boost, it doesn't change the taste at all. I'll be ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Terdic

customer_reviews.title: I had been happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I had been happy with it. However, after being diagnosed as menopausal and not having had a period for over 4 years, after using his product my FSH levels are back down to even lower than premenopausal and I have had my period again.
customer_reviews.author: Joan E. Sohm

customer_reviews.text: First time i try maca, has a strong taste, but taste good, well packaged, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well and it helps with my hot flashes.

customer_reviews.title: Magic Maca
customer_reviews.text: Love MACA. I take atleast one TBSP a day. Has balanced my hormones and helped my endurance in the gym

customer_reviews.title: Has helped.
customer_reviews.text: Has helped me so far. Trying to see what happens after a month.
customer_reviews.author: kimbley

customer_reviews.title: Value of products
customer_reviews.text: I like the fast delivery and the product tastes good in my . I do wish it would dissolve better in my morning coffee
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My first time trying maca and this company. No complaints about either!

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: It works great but the taste is horrible and there are a lot of chunks in it.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: There are many health benefits to maca powder and that ...
customer_reviews.text: There are many health benefits to maca powder and that is why i chose you use it in my morning smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: worth the green!
customer_reviews.text: Great product You get a good no jitter boost of energy From maca the Curciferous vegatable

customer_reviews.title: Hot flashes
customer_reviews.text: The taste was very good to me. I was hoping it would help with my hot flashes but it only slightly improved on my hot flashes.

customer_reviews.title: Mixes quickly into my drinks
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and I'm ready to use it frequently! The fine powder mixed easily in my coffee or smoothie. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Hormones
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! It has helped with my hormone imbalance. I put it in my yogurt or smoothies and I don’t taste a thing.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, but the packaging would not re-seal after the first use, which was irritating and very inconvenient.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how good this tasted. Good product! Will order again when I'm out.

customer_reviews.title: and the actual Maca Powder is of superior quality.
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time...and is in lovely packaging..and the actual Maca Powder is of superior quality..will definately buy again

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: Really good. I use it in my smoothies. I feel more energetic during the day when I use it.

customer_reviews.title: It Works Great.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Have had other maca products that taste awful, this one taste delicious!

customer_reviews.text: The smell and taste of the MACA root powder is great. I blend a tablespoon of the powder into my smoothies for an extra health benefit!

customer_reviews.title: Love this Maca
customer_reviews.text: Love this Maca, gives me the energy boost I need. I make in my tea in the morning at at night.

customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of Maca powder from Feel good organics. ive added it to my smoothies and they are so satisfying.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this organic maca powder and Feel Good Organics
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this organic maca powder and Feel Good Organics ! Have ordered this product and others multiple times through Amazon. Great in smoothies when you need an extra boost without caffeine!

customer_reviews.title: I received my package fast and was very happy with the whole experience!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product! Making some healthy changes in my diet, and these root powders are an awesome addition to my smoothie. Thank you kristine

customer_reviews.text: I really love this powder. I don't find it overly energizing or anything like that. It tastes great in my morning smoothies!

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!! Definitely recommend. I use it everyday In my smoothies and I can already feel a difference in my wellbeing! Love this company as well.

product_meta.title: Organic Peruvian Maca Root Powder | Perfect for Smoothies, Baking, Energy | Raw From Peru | Non-GMO, USDA Organic | 16oz Resealable Kraft Bag (1 Pound) | by FGO
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR SMOOTHIES, BAKING, YOGURT, OATMEAL and many more delicious & healthy recipes!
IMPORTED 100% RAW FROM PERUVIAN ANDES - This bag contains certified organic, 100% raw maca powder from mountain plateaus in the Peruvian Andes.

HEALTHY & DELICIOUS - Maca powder is produced from the root of the maca plant, a natural energy-boosting superfood, and is loaded with vitamins, minerals and plant sterols that provide endurance, mental clarity and hormone balance.
CERTIFIED USDA ORGANIC - All our products are certified USDA Organic by California Certified Organic Farmers (CCOF), a leader in organic certification. Look for the USDA Organic seal on our products!
LOVE IT OR YOUR MONEY BACK - If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase of our Maca for any reason, just email us and we'll refund your order in full, no questions asked!
